mapper.select: /* MembDao.getMembList 회원 리스트 조회 */ select a.memb_id ,a.memb_nm ,a.admin_yn ,a.use_yn ,a.join_dt ,a.regdate ,ifnull(date_format(a.regdate,'%y-%m-%d'),'') as regdate_str ,a.reguser ,a.moddate ,ifnull(date_format(a.moddate,'%y-%m-%d'),'') as moddate_str ,a.moduser from tb_memb_info a where a.del_yn = 'N' order by a.regdate desc limit #{startNum}, #{endNum}
/* MembDao.checkMembInfo 회원 상세정보 중복 체크 조회 */ select count(*) as cnt from tb_memb_info a where a.memb_id = #{membId}
